channel.title: GitHub Pascal Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of Pascal in GitHub

item.title: peazip/PeaZip
item.description: Free Zip / Unzip software and Rar file extractor. Cross-platform file and archive manager. Features volume spanning, compression, authenticated encryption. Supports 7Z, 7-Zip sfx, ACE, ARJ, Brotli, BZ2, CAB, CHM, CPIO, DEB, GZ, ISO, JAR, LHA/LZH, NSIS, OOo, PAQ/LPAQ, PEA, QUAD, RAR, RPM, split, TAR, Z, ZIP, ZIPX, Zstandard.

item.title: HeidiSQL/HeidiSQL
item.description: A lightweight client for managing MariaDB, MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Interbase and Firebird, written in Delphi

item.title: jrsoftware/issrc
item.description: Inno Setup is a free installer for Windows programs. First introduced in 1997, Inno Setup today rivals and even surpasses many commercial installers in feature set and stability.

item.title: Embarcadero/Dev-Cpp
item.description: A fast, portable, simple, and free C/C++ IDE

item.title: benjamimgois/goverlay
item.description: GOverlay is an opensource project that aims to create a Graphical UI to help manage Linux overlays.

item.title: viniciussanchez/RESTRequest4Delphi
item.description: API to consume REST services written in any programming language with support to Lazarus and Delphi

item.title: viniciussanchez/dataset-serialize
item.description: JSON to DataSet and DataSet to JSON converter for Delphi and Lazarus (FPC)

item.title: nofeletru/UsbAsp-flash
item.description: Program allow you to program flash memory on the protocols spi, I2C, MicroWire. Supports CH341a, CH347, UsbAsp, AVRISP(LUFA), Arduino, FT232H.

item.title: cheat-engine/cheat-engine
item.description: Cheat Engine. A development environment focused on modding
